languages.text: {n}Дознание выявило, что один из старших надзирателей мешал расследованию и помогал беглецам скрыться. Он надеялся, что кризис в колонии станет поводом для позорной отставки текущего главы колонии, к которому изменник имел личные счеты. Перед казнью еретик выдал координаты недавно расчищенных туннелей, от которых все это время ловко отводил внимание блюстителей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознание выявило, что один из старших надзирателей мешал расследованию и помогал беглецам скрыться. Он надеялся, что кризис в колонии станет поводом для позорной отставки текущего главы колонии, к которому изменник имел личные счеты. Перед казнью еретик выдал координаты недавно расчищенных туннелей, от которых все это время ловко отводил внимание блюстителей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorgulamalar, kıdemli bir gözetmenin soruşturmayı engellediğini ve kaçakların kaçmasına yardım ettiğini ortaya çıkardı. Kolonideki krizin, hainin kin beslediği koloninin mevcuttaki başının alçakça görevinden alınması için bahane olacağını ummuş. İdamı öncesinde kâfir, infazcıların soruşturma çabalarını akıllıca yönlendirdiği ve yakın zamanda temizlenmiş olan tünellerin koordinatlarını verdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgulamalar, kıdemli bir gözetmenin soruşturmayı engellediğini ve kaçakların kaçmasına yardım ettiğini ortaya çıkardı. Kolonideki krizin, hainin kin beslediği koloninin mevcuttaki başının alçakça görevinden alınması için bahane olacağını ummuş. İdamı öncesinde kâfir, infazcıların soruşturma çabalarını akıllıca yönlendirdiği ve yakın zamanda temizlenmiş olan tünellerin koordinatlarını verdi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les interrogatoires ont révélé qu'un administrateur supérieur avait fait obstruction à l'enquête et aidé les fugitifs à s'évader. Il avait une dent contre le dirigeant de la colonie et espérait que cette crise entraînerait son congédiement. Avant son exécution, l'hérétique a révélé les coordonnées des tunnels récemment déblayés, desquels il avait clairement détourné l'investigation des prévôts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les interrogatoires ont révélé qu'un administrateur supérieur avait fait obstruction à l'enquête et aidé les fugitifs à s'évader. Il avait une dent contre le dirigeant de la colonie et espérait que cette crise entraînerait son congédiement. Avant son exécution, l'hérétique a révélé les coordonnées des tunnels récemment déblayés, desquels il avait clairement détourné l'investigation des prévôts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尋問の結果、ある上級監督官が調査を妨害し、逃亡者の逃走を助けていたことが明らかになった。彼は、コロニーの危機を口実に、裏切り者が個人的恨みを抱いている現コロニーの責任者の不名誉な解任を狙っていた。処刑の直前、その異端者は、最近撤去されたトンネルの座標を明かすことで、執行官の部隊の調査の注意を巧みにそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尋問の結果、ある上級監督官が調査を妨害し、逃亡者の逃走を助けていたことが明らかになった。彼は、コロニーの危機を口実に、裏切り者が個人的恨みを抱いている現コロニーの責任者の不名誉な解任を狙っていた。処刑の直前、その異端者は、最近撤去されたトンネルの座標を明かすことで、執行官の部隊の調査の注意を巧みにそらした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}审讯结果表明，某位高阶监察员一直在暗中阻挠调查，还在私下协助犯人越狱。这个叛徒对殖民地现任负责人心怀不满，策划了卑鄙的阴谋诡计，打算在殖民地危机期间借机篡权。这个叛徒在遭到处决之前，交代了最近清理过的隧道坐标。他就是靠着这些隧道巧妙地转移了执法者的注意力，阻碍了调查工作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审讯结果表明，某位高阶监察员一直在暗中阻挠调查，还在私下协助犯人越狱。这个叛徒对殖民地现任负责人心怀不满，策划了卑鄙的阴谋诡计，打算在殖民地危机期间借机篡权。这个叛徒在遭到处决之前，交代了最近清理过的隧道坐标。他就是靠着这些隧道巧妙地转移了执法者的注意力，阻碍了调查工作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los interrogatorios revelaron que un supervisor de alto rango había estado obstruyendo la investigación y ayudando a los fugitivos a escapar. Tenía esperanzas de que la crisis en la colonia llevara al despido ignominioso del actual líder de la colonia, contra quien sentía un gran rencor. Antes de su ejecución, el hereje reveló las coordenadas de los túneles recién excavados que había ocultado a los esfuerzos investigativos del personal de seguridad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los interrogatorios revelaron que un supervisor de alto rango había estado obstruyendo la investigación y ayudando a los fugitivos a escapar. Tenía esperanzas de que la crisis en la colonia llevara al despido ignominioso del actual líder de la colonia, contra quien sentía un gran rencor. Antes de su ejecución, el hereje reveló las coordenadas de los túneles recién excavados que había ocultado a los esfuerzos investigativos del personal de seguridad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Verhöre haben ergeben, dass ein leitender Aufseher die Untersuchung behindert und den Geflohenen zur Flucht verholfen hat. Er hatte gehofft, die Krise in der Kolonie wäre ein Vorwand für die entwürdigende Entlassung des derzeitigen Oberhauptes der Kolonie, gegen den der Verräter einen persönlichen Groll hegte. Vor seiner Hinrichtung gab der Ketzer die Koordinaten der kürzlich geräumten Tunnel preis, aus denen heraus er die Ermittlungsbemühungen der Enforcer geschickt behindert hatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogations revealed that a senior overseer had been obstructing the investigation and helping the fugitives to escape. He had hoped that the crisis in the colony would be a pretext for the ignominious dismissal of the colony's current head, against whom the traitor had nursed a personal grudge. Before his execution, the heretic gave up the coordinates of the recently cleared tunnels, from which he had cleverly diverted the enforcers' investigative efforts.{/n}
